notesStmt.note: Translation of: La Gardũna de Sevilla y ançuelo de las bolsas.
Translated by John Davies--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Date of imprint suggested by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Includes publisher's list: p. [2]-[5] at end.
Imperfect: pages cropped, stained and tightly bound with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Library of Congress.
